Text: I'm doing most of the seeding of this series from volume 1 to volume 17. I shall seed each one in turn. Please people, once you have copies of these, keep seeding for as long as possible. Thanks.

Be warned, I shall seed until a couple of people can complete but from then on you must seed if you wish to keep this torrent alive. I shall focus on the torrents in this series that have no seeds. I will only do this once and then I shall stop seeding.
